# Exercice 5

```{r}
t <- seq(1,1110,0.01)

f_brow <- function(t){
  size <- length(t)
  dt <- t[2:size] - t[1:size - 1]
  incr <- rnorm(size - 1, 0, sqrt(dt))
  return(c(0, cumsum(incr)))
}
```

```{r}
plot(t,f_brow(t), type = "l", lwd = 2, xlab = "time", ylab = "", main = "Brownian motion simultated from times t")
```
